name: @alexcatdad/calico
description: Zero-dependency data export library. Convert JavaScript objects to JSON, CSV, YAML, or Markdown with full TypeScript support and sub-millisecond performance.
author: @alexcatdad

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir dist --format esm --target browser && bunx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist --skipLibCheck
